description: Introduced during the anime`s Bount arc, left the 11th Division after Kenpachi Zaraki killed the previous captain. He travelled the human world, but one day, while in a weakened state in a desert, he fell upon a hollow that almost killed him; the hollow was subdued by Kariya Jin, who allowed Maki to kill it. Maki swore his loyalty to Jin after that, only breaking the vow once to fight Zaraki.
name: Ichinose Maki
